providers.searchAccroche: Select the profile you want to explore :

home.header: Automobile GP at Circuit Paul Ricard
home.secondHeader: Enjoy an exceptional day of speed and adrenaline!
home.leCircuitPaulRicardEstRaviDaccueillir: Circuit Paul Ricard is delighted to host the 2024 edition of our Automobile Grand Prix, a thrilling celebration for lovers of speed and mechanical performance. This one-of-a-kind event offers you a full day of breathtaking races, exciting activities and entertainment for all ages.

pointsForts.grandPrix: The main attraction of the day, our Grand Prix promises breathtaking races with some of the best drivers on the circuit. Experience the excitement of speed and competition on one of the most emblematic circuits in France.
pointsForts.kartingForAll: Whether you are a beginner or an experienced driver, take advantage of our karting sessions. A perfect opportunity to feel the adrenaline of a race and why not, to discover future talents.
pointsForts.bateme: Experience the thrill of speed as a passenger in a racing car driven by professionals. An unforgettable experience that will give you the thrill of a real race.
pointsForts.animations: Discover a range of classic and modern cars, take part in interactive workshops and enjoy activities for the whole family.
pointsForts.restauration: Dining areas will be available to allow you to recharge your batteries and enjoy the day comfortably.

home.endOfPage: Join us for a memorable day at the heart of automotive action and passion. Fast&Fabulous at Circuit Paul Ricard is more than an event, it is an experience to be lived to the fullest!
home.a-day-long: Our aim is to create an unforgettable atmosphere, where the thrill of speed mingles with the excitement of competition. Breathtaking races, interactive activities and moments of relaxation are carefully planned to guarantee a complete experience. Whether you come with family, friends or solo, the Grand Prix at Circuit Paul Ricard is the ideal place to share your passion and create lasting memories.
home.about-gp-paul-ricard: About the Grand Prix at Circuit Paul Ricard
home.about-gp-paul-ricard-long: The Grand Prix at Circuit Paul Ricard - an event where passion for cars and the desire for unique experiences meet. Located in the south of France, the Circuit Paul Ricard is renowned for its impressive 5.8-kilometer track, featuring technical corners and long straights, providing the perfect terrain for speed enthusiasts. Our event is for everyone: from classic car enthusiasts to fans of cutting-edge motorsport technology.
home.our-philosophy-long: Passion for cars and motorsport is at the heart of our event. We believe that every visitor, whether amateur or expert, deserves an exceptional experience. That's why our Grand Prix offers a variety of activities - from go-karting to driving lessons - so that there's something for everyone.
